MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void BeginSession() cil managed

summary.span: 方法指示 DSML 服务器启动新会话。

span.span: The method instructs the DSML server to start a new session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会在等待来自 DSML 服务器的响应时阻止，并将根据超时属性。The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the property.

exception.span: 如果已在连接上打开会话，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when a session is already open on the connection.

exception.span: 如果从响应 的服务器返回的 XML 不是格式良好的，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when the XML returned from the Server in response to the is not well-formed.

exception.span: 如果与 DSML 服务器的通信发生故障或者该服务器无可用会话，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server or when the server is out of available sessions.

span.span: Thrown if was not returned by the current instance from a call to .

exception.span: 请求未完成。

span.span: The request did not complete.

exception.span: 无可用的流。

span.span: No stream is available.

exception.span: 如果服务器返回的响应无效，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when the response returned by server is not valid.

exception.span: 如果以前调用过中止操作或在处理请求时出错，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when abort was previously called or when an error occurred while processing the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndSession() cil managed

summary.span: 方法结束与 DSML 服务器的会话并清除 属性。

span.span: The method ends the session with the DSML server and clears the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会在等待来自 DSML 服务器的响应时阻止，并将根据超时属性。The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the property. 如果 DSML 服务器已终止上自己的会话将引发。If the DSML server has already terminated the session on its own, a will be thrown. 如果是否仍然有效后，将引发异常，则表明请求永远不会到达服务器，并且连接仍被视为有效。If the is still valid after the exception is thrown, the request never reached the server and the connection is still considered valid.

exception.span: 如果与 DSML 服务器的通信发生故障，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server.

exception.span: 如果没有打开的会话，则引发该异常。

span.span: Thrown when there is no open session.

summary.span: 向 DSML 服务器发送一个对象。

span.span: Sends an object to the DSML server.
